Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Provides Classes that cumpute brat specific operations such as de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.BratAjaxCasController#getDocumentResponse(String, String)....

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TypeAdapter
    Type Adapters for span, arc, and chain annotations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArcAdapter
    A class that is used to create Brat Arc to CAS relations and vice-versa
    BratAjaxCasController
    an Ajax Controller for the BRAT Front End.
    BratAjaxCasUtil
    Contain Methods for updating CAS Objects directed from brat UI, different utility methods to process the CAS such getting the sentence address, determine page numbers,...
    BratAjaxConfiguration
    Generation of brat type definitions.
    ChainAdapter
    A class that is used to create Brat chain to CAS and vice-versa
    ColoringStrategy  
    SpanAdapter
    A class that is used to create Brat Span to CAS and vice-versa
    TypeUtil
    Utility Class for TypeAdapter with static methods such as geting TypeAdapter based on its CAS Type
    WebAnnoConst
    Constants for annotation types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArcCrossedMultipleSentenceException
    Throw an exception if the arc annotation is not in the same sentence * @author Seid Muhie Yimam
    BratAnnotationException
    throw an exception if the a span annotation is not in the same sentence
    MultipleSentenceCoveredException
    Throw an exception if the a span annotation is not in the same sentence * @author Seid Muhie Yimam
